name: A Fireworked Night
description:
The Story

It's Burn Town's annual fireworks show, but the organizers forgot something important: the Grand Firework. Without it, the town's show wouldn't be something special. However, no one knows where the firework is, and no one was able to find it in time. With the show getting ready to start,  a bundle of firework fuses somehow finds the Grand Firework underground. Now, they need to deliver the firework to the show before it ends. There needs to be a spectacular finale to the show!

  • Firework based platforming challenges
  • 5 secret fireworks to find
  • Flaming enemies to avoid
  • Too many/too little particles
  • Very scuffed
  • mode? Death Gooey A (this joke is old, i should stop)
